info.title: ChummerHub
info.description: Description for API v1 to store and search Chummer Xml files

get.summary: Search for Sinners for one user

parameters.name: groupname
parameters.description: In case you want to rename the group

schema.description: In case you want to rename the group

put.summary: The Xml or Zip File can be uploaded (knowing the previously stored Id)

delete.summary: Remove a sinner from a group. If this sinner is the last member of it's group, the group will be deleted as well!
Delete a Group (recursive - only Admins can do that)

get.summary: Search for all members and subgroups of a group

put.summary: The Xml or Zip File can be uploaded (knowing the previously stored Id)

post.summary:
Store the MetaData for chummerfiles (to get a Id).
This Id can be used to store the actual file with PUT afterwards.
Alternatively, the DownloadUrl can be set directly from the Client.

tagComment.description: This has NO FUNCTION and is only here for Debugging reasons.

myAdminIdentityRole.description: Only users of the specified Role can join this group
Only users of the specified Role can join this group
